tool: Hob (electric, up to 3kW, excluding hazards from any materials see separate RA)

before: Perform a visual inspection of hob
Sense whether hob is already hot WITHOUT TOUCHING IT
Ensure cable is not near heated part
Ensure fire extinguisher and fire blanket is nearby
during: Keep workspace clear and free from dust and flammabable materials (esp newspaper, sawdust, plastics etc)
after: Ensure hob is cool before leaving area
Ensure area is clear of debris

controls: Ensure hob is cool before leaving area
Ensure hob is cool before leaving area
